entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IEnumerator does not work properly if received directly from a List inside a linq statement #92253
  • Error NETSDK1013: The TargetFramework value '' was not recognized. #92251
  • Remove usage of InterceptorsPreview feature after updating to 8.0 RC2 SDK #92248
  • Test failure: System.Web.Tests.HttpUtilityTest.JavaScriptStringEncode #92246
    9.0.0
  • GetAttributes(bool inherit) inconsistency for new attributes added for keyed services #92242
    8.0.0
  • Size of source-build intermediate packages have increased significantly #92240
  • Will #88851 be backported to .NET Core 6 or 7? #92239
  • [browser] Enabling WasmStripILAfterAOT breaks app with 'NIY encountered' and results in larger build size #92238
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #92236
  • [8.0] Expected and actual version of WASI SDK does not match. Please delete /usr/local/wasi-sdk/ folder to provision a new version. #92233
  • LINQ `Sum` behavior change #92230
    8.0.0
  • Feature Request: restrict PDB resolution #92227
  • No warning for [LibraryImport] returning a [GeneratedComInterface] with CCW options #92222
    9.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols - SearchRequest is not returning attribute value with empty string #92221
    Future
  • Remaining .NET 8 work for TensorPrimitives #92219
    8.0.0
  • Incorrect NRE during operations on structures in method marked with AgressiveOptimization #92218
    8.0.0
  • NRE in ConfigurationBinder.BindInstance #92213
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT: representation of spill/unspill in JIT IR #92207
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HashSet<T>.UnionWith should copy data from another HashSet<T> #92206
    Future
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\Dynamic\\Dynamic\\Dynamic.cmd #92202
  • Test failure _Vector128_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector128.Program.LessThanOrEqualAnySingle() #92201
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\ComWrappers\\API\\ComWrappersTests\\ComWrappersTests.cmd #92200

Closed

  • dotnet dump no longer working on OSX #90938
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Tests.Perf_StringBuilder #92073
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Reflection documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88571
    8.0.0
  • PLINQ `SelectMany()` generates Native AOT warnings #92169
    9.0.0
  • [Perf -22%] System.Collections.Tests.Perf_Dictionary.ContainsValue #39028
    Future
  • Perf pipeline broken with `dpkg was interrupted, you must manually run 'sudo dpkg ...` #91959
  • Port System.Threading documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88578
    8.0.0
  • I'm trying out how the `QuicListener` API to see how suitable it is, but so far I've been unable to even get it past the hello world stage. #88298
    9.0.0
  • CustomMarshaller uses confusion #92049
  • Consider adding an `AggregateBy` method to LINQ #91533
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support System.Diagnostics.Debugger attributes #57085
    9.0.0
  • Json source generator regression #92214
  • Assertion failed '!node->OperIs(GT_CALL) || (node->AsCall()->gtCallType == CT_HELPER)' during 'Optimize index checks' #91862
    8.0.0
  • .Net 8 RC1 WASM - compatibility - lack of support for older systems #92127
  • [wasm][debugger] Add object inheritance tests with different JMC settings #75959
    9.0.0
  • Remove build-test.cmd and runtest.cmd related logic from build.cmd #12176
    Future
  • Add checks for correct number of ProjectsToBuild for each TestGroup #12177
    Future
  • EventPipeBufferManager::WriteAllBuffersToFile Spends a Lot of CPU Getting the Next Event From a Thread #8261
    Future
  • Expose EventPipe Tracing API #9386
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Bump Microsoft.Private.IntelliSense package version #92255
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Bump Microsoft.Private.IntelliSense package version #92254
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • JIT: add missing xarch RMW case #92252
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Use strategy in StrategyBasedComWrappers.ComputeVtables #92250
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Fix optSwitchConvert #92249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle obsolete InterceptorsPreview with .NET 8 RC2 SDK #92247
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Numerics and Tensors backport #92245
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasi] Bump wasi sdk to 20. #92243
    area-Build-mono
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: generalize assert to handle SIMD64 #92235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Workaround a C++/CLI bug involving DIMs (#89253)" #92234
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Numerics, blocking-release, 8.0.0
  • Temporarily disable the foreground-shutdown test #92231
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Optimize Random{NumberGenerator}.GetItems for power-of-two choices #92229
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] running tests in a "side car" thread #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update PACKAGE.md #92225
    area-System.Data
  • Add missing System.Net.Http.Json comments #92223
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add xml comments to System.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames members #92220
    area-System.Net
  • [QUIC] Throw ODE if connection/listener is disposed #92215
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Move portable RID graph into runtime and clean-up #92211
    needs-area-label
  • Update solution files #92209
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve performance of BigInteger.Multiply(large, small) #92208
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use FMA in TensorPrimitives.CosineSimilarity #92205
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [NO MERGE] test stress fragment splitting #92203
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Update HttpClientJsonExtensions.Get.AsyncEnumerable.cs #92199
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Use strategy in StrategyBasedComWrappers.ComputeVtables #92085
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • fixed problems with how sampling is done and how we suspend to change heap count in DATAS #91712
  • [release/8.0] Make src gen for property setters consistent with reflection #92167
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix wasi build. #92232
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Check if loop body occured before loopTop and if so unmark alignment #91918
    Servicing-approved, blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix typo in documentation comments #90903
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Initialize jitstdout lazily #92212
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Extract all side effects of the index in optRemoveRangeCheck #92210
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Add link to docs to interop error messages #92182
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [mono][aot] Avoid compiling the same method multiple times during dedup. #92178
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [workloads] Opt into using package groups #92168
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Avoid marking property/event attributes multiple times #92153
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove public provider from rundown session #92048
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix wasi build. #92216
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement Linq AggregateBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #92089
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Check for <framework_name>.deps.json when enumerating framework paths #92032
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Check for <framework_name>.deps.json when enumerating framework paths #92033
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 7.0.x
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Add package readmes #92224
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Add a few missing xml comments for APIs in threading and tasks #92157
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Fix typo in host-runtime-information.md #92217
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Fix TensorPrimitives.CosineSimilarity to use vectorized implementations #92204
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Extract all side effects of the index in optRemoveRangeCheck #92116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Case: The method has not been jitted yet #90821
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Set severity of rule CA1870 to warning #92135
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Ensure the adapter name 100% matching when parsing proc/net/dev #92187
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Atomics #92102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove "Is supported on this TFM" logic from marshalling generators and instead handle it during factory construction #91768
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix: Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #91961
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Address some `SString` const issues #92156
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Disable failing apple mobile tests #92108
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add -skipcrossarchnative and -verbose options #90554
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Ensure VN handles both forms of the xarch shift instructions for SIMD #91601
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Store pinned static fields in the Pinned Object Heap. #89895
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix trimming of DebuggerDisplay with Name #92191
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Use 1MB fallback stack when procfs fails #83271
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][WIP]Enable runtime tests on android arm64 #89114
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasi] Add AOT compiler build to the official build #92095
    area-Build-mono
  • [CI][Android] Build mono runtime for Android on PRs #91809
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] WASM side-car - multi-threading proposal #91731
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Issue 90788 improvments to System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch #90789
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement StoreVector128x2 for Arm64 #92109
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][mono][aot] Implementation of nollvm init method #89074
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Initialize jitstdout lazily #92123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector2 on arm64 #91659
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add attribute analysis for missing cases in ILLink analyzer #92166
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • add packaging for linux-musl #92145
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
